value:
A refined beard that gives off a slightly
dandy ambiance. Don't worry—it's
artificial.

Handcrafted tortoiseshell-style frames.
So well-made that the most discerning
will be impressed.

A black eye patch that exudes the wild
ambiance that outlaws long for.

A striking mask best suited
to those who wish to avoid
all conversation.
A mask that's handy to wear.

Others might be surprised by this
choice of eyewear. Has scenery
printed on the inside to gaze at.

A mask to block light for a good
night's sleep. Give tired eyes a
rest every once in a while.

Cute red ribbon so huge that it
somehow makes the wearer's
face look smaller.

An intimidating pair of horns that can be
easily attached to the head. The bigger
the better, right?

A radiant starburst of a halo that grants
the wearer undeniable charisma. As a
bonus, it facilitates nighttime journeys.

You, summoned from another world.
According to legend, you are the hero
that will save this world.

Clear Book IV, Chapter 12: Part 5 with Alfonse:
Prince of Askr on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.)

Clear Book IV, Chapter 12: Part 5 on Hard or
higher with Sharena: Princess of Askr on your
team. (Allies deployed as cohorts using Pair Up
do not count.)

Clear Book IV, Chapter 12: Part 5 on Lunatic
with Anna: Commander on your team.(Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do
not count.)

Finish all turns to complete a game of Pawns
of Loki.

Clear the Bound Hero Battle against Tiki
& Nagi with Sharena: Princess of Askr
on your team.

Clear the Bound Hero Battle against Tiki
& Nagi on Lunatic or higher with Alfonse:
Prince of Askr on your team.

Defeat Tiki: Dragon Scion at level 40 or
higher with Sharena: Princess of Askr.

Defeat Nagi: Dragon Avatar at level 40 or
higher with Alfonse: Prince of Askr.

Clear the Bound Hero Battle against Tiki
& Nagi on Lunatic or higher difficulty using
an all-armored team.

Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Jorge:
Traveling Peddler on Lunatic or higher using
a team with an infantry, armored, cavalry,
and flying ally.

Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Petrine:
Icy Flame-Lancer on Lunatic or higher using
a team with an infantry, armored, cavalry,
and flying ally.

Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Nemesis:
King of Liberation on Lunatic or higher using
a team with an infantry, armored, cavalry,
and flying ally.

Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Galle:
Azure Rider on Lunatic or higher using
a team with an infantry, armored, cavalry,
and flying ally.

Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Caellach:
Tiger Eye on Lunatic or higher using a team
with an infantry, armored, cavalry, and
flying ally.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.

Clear Paralogue 56: Part 1 on Lunatic difficulty
with a sword ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 56: Part 2 on Lunatic difficulty
with a lance ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 56: Part 3 on Lunatic difficulty
with an axe ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

We should turn in
for the night

Líf and Thrasir have come to attend the
festival, brimming with love and radiant
with life! ...Are they planning something?

King of Askr. Taking part in the Day of Devotion
to spend some quality time with his family.

Queen of Askr, adored by her people. Joining in
on the Day of Devotion festivities alongside her
family members.

Prince of Askr, serious yet gentle. Participating
in the Day of Devotion festival to display his
affection for his people.

Imperial princess of the Emblian Empire.
Involving herself in the Day of Devotion
festivities in an attempt to make sense
of what love means.

(Duo Skills can be used once per map by
tapping the Duo button. Duo Skills cannot
be used by units deployed using Pair Up.)

Standard Effect 1: Duel
If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total
less than 190, treats unit's stats as 190 in
modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents
will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any
values added by merges and skills.)

Can prevent foes from healing, but
exacts a toll on allies. Has a Duo Skill
that can turn that into an advantage...

Shields allies from close-range attacks
and takes their place in combat. A
boon to distant-attacking allies.

Shields allies from distant attacks
and takes their place in combat. Aids
allies who attack at close range.

On attack initiation, gets a guaranteed
follow-up and cooldown charge +1.
Can effectively get Def/Res+12 too!

Can take a hit and strike his foes
down on the counter! He reaches
new heights with his new Special.

Can reduce damage of distant attacks
and counter them hard. She can also
change penalties to Atk/Def to buffs.

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Effective against flying foes. If foe's Def ≥ foe's
Res+5, deals +7 damage.

Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to allies
within 2 spaces during combat. Inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

Grants Spd+3. Deals damage = 20% of
unit's Spd.

At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 50%, grants
Atk+5 to unit and inflicts Atk-5 on foe during
combat, and also, if unit initiates combat, foe
cannot make a follow-up attack.

Grants Atk/Spd+4 to allies within 2 spaces
during combat. If unit is within 2 spaces of an
ally, grants Atk/Spd+4 to unit during combat.

If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP = 100%
at start of combat, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4
to unit during combat and inflicts Special
cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during
combat. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

If unit is within 3 spaces of two allies in a
support-partner pair (excluding unit), grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+6 to unit during combat, and
also, if unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 5 HP to unit. (Triggers even if
0 damage is dealt.)

At the start of turn 1, grants Special cooldown
count-2 to unit. Treats foe's Def/Res as if
reduced by 50% during combat. Restores HP
= 50% of damage dealt.

If foe is 2 spaces from unit, reduces damage
from foe's attacks by 40%. After triggering,
boosts damage for unit's next attack by 40% of
unit's Res. (Boost resets at the end of combat.)

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP ≥ 75% at
start of combat, inflicts Atk/Def-6 on foe during
combat, and also, if foe can make a follow-up
attack, reduces damage from foe's first attack
by 75%.

Grants Atk+3. If unit is within 3 spaces of an
ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+6 to unit during
combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up
attack, and reduces the percentage of foe's
"reduce damage by X%" skills by 50%,
but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 20
damage to nearest ally. (Example: a foe with
a "reduce damage by 45%" skill would reduce
damage by 23% instead.)

If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, inflicts
Atk/Res-5 on foe during combat, and when
unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 4 HP to unit. (Triggers even if
0 damage is dealt.)

If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, inflicts
Atk/Res-5 on foe during combat, and when
unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 4 HP to unit. (Triggers even if
0 damage is dealt.)

If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, inflicts
Atk/Res-5 on foe during combat, and when
unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 4 HP to unit. (Triggers even if
0 damage is dealt.)

If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, inflicts
Atk/Res-5 on foe during combat, and when
unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 4 HP to unit. (Triggers even if
0 damage is dealt.)

If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, inflicts
Atk/Res-5 on foe during combat, and when
unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 4 HP to unit. (Triggers even if
0 damage is dealt.)

If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, inflicts
Atk/Res-5 on foe during combat, and when
unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 4 HP to unit. (Triggers even if
0 damage is dealt.)

If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Def/Res+X to unit during combat (X = number
of allies within 2 spaces; max 3).

If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Def/Res+X to unit during combat (X = number
of allies within 2 spaces + 2; max 5).

If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Def/Res+X to unit during combat (X = 2 ×
number of allies within 2 spaces, + 1; max 7).

$aIf unit initiates combat, foe cannot recover
HP during or after combat, and after combat,
inflicts【Deep Wounds】on target and foes within
1 space of target.

【Deep Wounds】
Unit's HP cannot be healed through its
next action.

$aIf unit initiates combat, foe cannot recover
HP during or after combat, and after combat,
inflicts【Deep Wounds】on target and foes within
2 spaces of target.

【Deep Wounds】
Unit's HP cannot be healed through its
next action.

$aFoe cannot recover HP during or after combat,
and after combat, inflicts【Deep Wounds】on target
and foes within 2 spaces of target.

【Deep Wounds】
Unit's HP cannot be healed through its
next action.

$aIf a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or
beast damage and initiates combat against an
ally adjacent to unit, triggers【Savior】on unit.

If unit triggers Savior, grants Def/Res+1
during combat.

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's
place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that
unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able
to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior
triggers, after-combat movement effects do
not occur.

$aIf a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or
beast damage and initiates combat against an
ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers【Savior】
on unit.

If unit triggers Savior, grants Def/Res+2
during combat.

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's
place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that
unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able
to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior
triggers, after-combat movement effects do
not occur.

$aIf a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or
beast damage and initiates combat against an
ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers【Savior】
on unit.

If unit triggers Savior, grants Def/Res+4
during combat.

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's
place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that
unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able
to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior
triggers, after-combat movement effects do
not occur.

$aIf a foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and
initiates combat against an ally adjacent to unit,
triggers【Savior】on unit.

If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Res+1
during combat.

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's
place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that
unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able
to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior
triggers, after-combat movement effects do
not occur.

Deals damage to foes within 3 spaces = 10 +
50% of total damage dealt to HP of allies
within 3 spaces (max damage: 40). Inflicts
Atk/Spd-7 on foes within 3 spaces of unit
through their next actions.
